titleStmt.title: City justice; or, True equity expos'd. Being an humble petition to the king, of eight grandees of one party, against four of another. / Faithfully turn'd into verse dogril, by as real a well-wisher to them, as they are to monarchy. ; To the tune of Packington's pound.

notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: cropped, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
